description: He came face to face with the alleged Long Island serial killer. 12 years later, his tip helped crack the case
Tornado damage to Pfizer plant in North Carolina unlikely to cause major drug supply shortages, FDA says
Russia comes under pressure at UN to avoid global food crisis and revive Ukrainian grain shipments
While North Korea fires cruise missiles, it stays mum on U.S. soldier who crossed into the country
Suspected gas explosion in Johannesburg rips open roads and flips cars during rush hour, killing 1 and injuring 48
